text: In telecommunication, the term wideband modem has the following meanings: #A modem whose modulated output signal can have an essential frequency spectrum that is broader than that which can be wholly contained within, and faithfully transmitted through, a voice channel with a nominal 4 kHz bandwidth. #A modem whose bandwidth capability is greater than that of a narrowband modem. ==References== * Category:Networking hardware Category:Modems
title: Wideband modem
